[Inexhaustible Countermoves](/Feats.aspx?ID=6182) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 169 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

At the start of each enemy's turn, you gain an extra reaction you can use only during that turn to perform an [Opportune Riposte](/Actions.aspx?ID=2819), or a [Reactive Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=5832) if you have that reaction.
